TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnregisterAssembly extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension

summary.span: Use the UnregisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

span.span: Use the UnregisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: For usage and parameter information, see [UnregisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3).

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [UnregisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/04f549dd-3591-4dda-9c3a-cf6ede9df2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64 /\ / /UnRegisterAssemblyTask non è possibile risolvere una libreria di oggetti COM registrati come componenti a 32 bit.Framework64/\/UnRegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework /\ / /UnRegisterAssemblyTask non è possibile risolvere una libreria di oggetti COM registrati come componenti a 64 bit.Framework/\/UnRegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. Ad esempio, se si registra una libreria di oggetti COM chiamati ClassLibrary1 come componenti a 32 bit in un computer a 64 bit, eseguire Visual Studio e cambiare la destinazione in x64, la compilazione ha esito negativo con l'errore seguente:For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`
